author: toddchapin
title: Building 'Realverse' Metaverse Dapp
description: Metaverse projects represent fantasy worlds.  Real world vision, use and utility is needed.  A 'Real' Earth Geospatial Dapp is required.
solution: Developing Geodaka.com, .io Geospatial digital twin of the planet.  GIS, Game Engine and the Cardano are combined to create a Dapp for all.
experience: Developed https://geodaka.com/ a functioning POC MVP GIS where bus/prop owners can reg. prop. own digital space, digital world wide platform
